scripts.start: echo 'Please see luma.gl website for how to run examples' && open http://uber.github.io/luma.gl/#/documentation/getting-started/examples
scripts.clean: rm -fr dist dist-es6 && mkdir -p dist/es5 dist/esm dist/es6
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-es6 && npm run build-esm && npm run build-es5 && npm run build-size
scripts.publish-prod: yarn build && yarn test-fast && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: yarn build && yarn test-fast && npm publish --tag beta
